sourceMeaningMnemonic: A <radical>mouth</radical> that is <radical>old</radical> is going to be <kanji>hard</kanji>.
meaningInfo: Go ahead and touch that old man's mouth. It's super hard feeling when you touch it.
readingMnemonic: You touch the old man's <kanji>hard</kanji> mouth and it crumbles away, revealing the face of a <reading><ja>子</ja></reading> (<ja>こ</ja>) inside.
readingInfo: "You pressed the hard skin holding me captive! Thank you!" the <ja>子</ja> says, as they break free from their hard mouth prison.
